revised_title: A New Method for Calculating Annuities on Lives
tldr: The author proposes a new method for calculating the value of annuities on lives, based on the assumption that a portion of the rent should be paid to the heirs of the annuity holder, proportional to the time elapsed between the last payment and the life's expiration. This method takes into account the uniformity of life decrements in tables of observations and provides a more accurate calculation of life values.
